trans-unit.source: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.
trans-unit.target: The Ad mediation report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.

trans-unit.source: Ad mediation report
trans-unit.target: Ad mediation report

trans-unit.source: Ad mediation report
trans-unit.target: Ad mediation report

trans-unit.source: The **Ad mediation** report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.
trans-unit.target: The **Ad mediation** report lets you see your effective fill rate and the respective fill rates for the ad networks you're using.

trans-unit.source: It also shows the adoption rates of each of your mediation configurations and provides visibility into errors reported by ad networks and the mediator.
trans-unit.target: It also shows the adoption rates of each of your mediation configurations and provides visibility into errors reported by ad networks and the mediator.

trans-unit.source: You can view this data in your dashboard, or [download the report](download-analytic-reports.md) to view offline.
trans-unit.target: You can view this data in your dashboard, or [download the report](download-analytic-reports.md) to view offline.

trans-unit.source: **Important** The **Ad mediation** report only provides data if you are using [Windows ad mediation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/dn864359) in your app.
trans-unit.target: **Important** The **Ad mediation** report only provides data if you are using [Windows ad mediation](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/windows/apps/xaml/dn864359) in your app.

trans-unit.source: Page filters
trans-unit.target: Page filters

trans-unit.source: Near the top of the page, you can expand **Page filters** to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.
trans-unit.target: Near the top of the page, you can expand **Page filters** to filter all of the data on this page by date range and/or by market.

trans-unit.source: **Date**: The default filter is **Last 30 days**, but you can expand this up to **Last 12 months**.
trans-unit.target: **Date**: The default filter is **Last 30 days**, but you can expand this up to **Last 12 months**.

trans-unit.source: **Market**: The default setting is **All markets**.
trans-unit.target: **Market**: The default setting is **All markets**.

trans-unit.source: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show ratings from customers in that market.
trans-unit.target: You can choose a specific market if you want this page to only show ratings from customers in that market.

trans-unit.source: **Platform**: The default setting is **All platforms**.
trans-unit.target: **Platform**: The default setting is **All platforms**.

trans-unit.source: If your app targets multiple platforms, you can choose a specific platform.
trans-unit.target: If your app targets multiple platforms, you can choose a specific platform.

trans-unit.source: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in **Page filters**.
trans-unit.target: The info in all of the charts listed below will reflect the period of time selected in **Page filters**.

trans-unit.source: By default this will include data from all of the markets and platforms in which your app is listed, unless you've used the **Page filters** to specify a specific market and/or platform.
trans-unit.target: By default this will include data from all of the markets and platforms in which your app is listed, unless you've used the **Page filters** to specify a specific market and/or platform.

trans-unit.source: Ad mediation performance
trans-unit.target: Ad mediation performance

trans-unit.source: The **Ad mediation performance** chart shows the average total fill rate over the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: The **Ad mediation performance** chart shows the average total fill rate over the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: This is the average fill rate across all user sessions, regardless of your mediation configuration or how often different ad networks were called.
trans-unit.target: This is the average fill rate across all user sessions, regardless of your mediation configuration or how often different ad networks were called.

trans-unit.source: You can click the **Mediation requests** heading to see the average number of individual mediation requests, or click **Ads delivered** to see the average total number of ads delivered.
trans-unit.target: You can click the **Mediation requests** heading to see the average number of individual mediation requests, or click **Ads delivered** to see the average total number of ads delivered.

trans-unit.source: Ad provider fill rates
trans-unit.target: Ad provider fill rates

trans-unit.source: The **Ad provider fill rates** chart shows the average fill rate of each of your ad networks over the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: The **Ad provider fill rates** chart shows the average fill rate of each of your ad networks over the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: Info for each ad network is shown together to help you compare each ad network's performance.
trans-unit.target: Info for each ad network is shown together to help you compare each ad network's performance.

trans-unit.source: Unique users per mediation configuration
trans-unit.target: Unique users per mediation configuration

trans-unit.source: The **Unique users per mediation configuration** chart shows the total number of unique users who received each version of your mediation configuration over the selected period of time.
trans-unit.target: The **Unique users per mediation configuration** chart shows the total number of unique users who received each version of your mediation configuration over the selected period of time.

trans-unit.source: Errors by ad network
trans-unit.target: Errors by ad network

trans-unit.source: The **Errors by ad network** chart shows the total number of requests and errors for each of your ad networks, along with the percentage of requests that resulted in an error.
trans-unit.target: The **Errors by ad network** chart shows the total number of requests and errors for each of your ad networks, along with the percentage of requests that resulted in an error.

trans-unit.source: Errors by type
trans-unit.target: Errors by type

trans-unit.source: The **Errors by type** chart shows the specific errors experienced by each ad network.
trans-unit.target: The **Errors by type** chart shows the specific errors experienced by each ad network.

trans-unit.source: It also shows the percentage of total errors for that network that a specific error represents, so you can get an idea of which errors are coming up frequently per ad network.
trans-unit.target: It also shows the percentage of total errors for that network that a specific error represents, so you can get an idea of which errors are coming up frequently per ad network.
